modName: Chaos star bikini shoes gloves necklace UNP CBBE UNPB BBP - DELETED
summary: skimpy light armor, craftable  in leather. Top, belt, trousers, shoes, necklace, gloves. Few color variants. UNP, CBBE, UNPB BBP for now. Requires HDT high heels
descriptionHtml:
Armor is light armor, craftable in leather (necklace in jewellery), temperable, supports weight slider, base armor is 36  for belt, top, trousers, 28 for shoes gloves.
Has 6 pieces: top, belt, trousers, necklace, shoes, gloves
Name begins from "chaos"
Made for UNP (latest) body, converted for  UNPB BBP 2.52 (latest) and CBBE 3.4f (latest)

[size=5]Requires [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213]HDT high heels[/url][/size]

Top (slot 32) and belt (slot 56): ebony, copper, gold, steel
Trousers (slot 32), shoes (slot 37), gloves (slot 33), necklace (slot 35): copperblack, coppergreen, ebonywhite, goldred, goldpurp, goldblue, steelblack, steelred

If you want file without HDT high heels that contains only trousers, top, belt you can download it [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87153]Chaos star bikini UNP CBBE UNPB BBP[/url]
(yes, that file has same .esp as this, just lesser items and no HDT high heels)

F.A.Q.
Q: Do you plan to make it for other bodytypes/change armor type/add other pieces?
A: Perhaps, if mod will be popular.

Q: Can I make retexture/conversion to other body and upload it on nexus?
A: You are welcome. Just remember to give me credits and link to original mod.

-------------------Changelog-----------------------------
v1.05-1.06 Added necklace, gloves, shoes

-------------------Permissions---------------------------
You can do whatever you want while it is non-commercial destribution and you give me credits
and thanks as original author.
I don't give permission to upload it to steam.

--------------------Credits--------------------------------

mod use)

PS. Actually gloves are bracelets.
